lom:description.lom:string: "There are three main factors that cause individuals with disabilities to be underrepresented in science, engineering, and mathematics fields: preparation of students with disabilities; access to facilities, programs, and equipment; and acceptance by educators, employers and co-workers. Technology can have a positive affect on all of these factors and help open doors to new areas of study and employment. This paper explores the role of information technology, describes a campus program designed to positively influence each of the factors, and makes a series of recommendations for action."

lom:keyword.lom:string: disabled, persons with disabilities, science, engineering, mathematics, retention, recruitment, attitude

lom:title.lom:string: Increasing the representation of people with disabilities in science, engineering and mathematics
